product.title: The Lion King 1½ | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
The Lion King 1½

In a much-anticipated follow-up to the wildly popular The Lion King, this heartwarming sequel retells the original story from the vantage points of two whimsical characters, Pumbaa the warthog and Timon the meerkat. Kids will enjoy visiting with all of the same friendly creatures they met in the first installment, but will see events in a whole new light as presented by the alternate narrators. This unique re-telling illustrates to young readers how changing the point of view can significantly alter a story.

Tie-in Activity: Choose another favorite book of your child’s and imagine how it might change if another character had served as the primary narrator. Page through and talk about how the events and opinions may have been presented differently, and what details would have been emphasized.
